item.title: Threat of US-EU trade war looms as Trump and top European official plan talks in Scotland
item.description: President Donald Trump has returned to his golf course in Turnberry, Scotland, for a round before discussing trade with European Commission chief Ursula von der Leyen.

item.title: The Suncoast’s Hottest Day of 2025
item.description: No sea breeze means today will likely be the hottest day of 2025

item.title: Man admits to shooting girlfriend’s husband because he couldn’t ‘outfight’ him, police say
item.description: The suspect told police he was scared for his life when his girlfriend's husband confronted him in a parking lot.

item.title: Farmer’s Market Sunday Forecast
item.description: Thunderstorm chances are low for the weekend, although a brief, isolated shower could pop up on the Suncoast Sunday

item.title: Death investigation underway on Carnival cruise ship, authorities say
item.description: Authorities are investigating a death on a Carnival cruise ship.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Sunday
item.description: Beaches Sunday have a slight chance of an afternoon storm

item.title: Boat of 5 hospitalized after Charlotte Harbor crash
item.description: Multiple agencies rushed to respond to a single-vehicle boat crash Saturday.

item.title: Sunday Afternoon and Evening Forecast
item.description: The “Feels Like” temps won’t drop to the 90s until 8 PM

item.title: Firefighters unite to extinguish Punta Gorda garage fire
item.description: Seven fire engines came together Saturday to save a Punta Gorda home from an encroaching blaze.

item.title: One burnt in Turtle Bay blaze
item.description: One person is now recovering after their entire boat caught fire Saturday morning.

item.title: Hottest Day of the Year Today
item.description: “Feels Like” temps will climb to 110° to 114°
